auth.loginSubtitle: Sign in to access your dashboard
auth.name: Name
auth.termsAgreement: By creating an account, you agree to our

hero.headline: Hire Elite Candidates
hero.subheadline: Say goodbye to spending long hours going through piles of resumes. Our AI hiring agent vets candidates, conducts interviews, and delivers comprehensive evaluation reports automatically.

services.title: Three Powerful Ways to Hire
services.subtitle: Choose the solution that fits your needs - or use both for maximum efficiency.

hiring.title: Start Hiring
hiring.subtitle: AI Hiring Agent
hiring.description: Let AI handle the heavy lifting. Our hiring agent screens resumes, conducts interviews, and delivers evaluation reports automatically. Focus on what matters - meeting great candidates.

quickInvite.title: Quick Interview Invite
quickInvite.subtitle: One-Click Batch Invite
quickInvite.description: Upload resumes and job descriptions, then send interview invitations with QR codes and links to all candidates in one click.

api.title: RoboHire
api.subtitle: For Developers
api.description: Integrate powerful AI recruitment capabilities into your existing systems. Parse resumes, match candidates, evaluate interviews, and more with our comprehensive API suite.

howItWorks.title: How RoboHire Works
howItWorks.subtitle: We use AI to act as a hiring agent that vets each resume, contacts and interviews matched candidates, and sends you comprehensive evaluation reports automatically.

step1.title: Set Up Your Job Opening
step1.description: Describe your ideal candidate or upload a job description. Specify must-have skills, experience requirements, and nice-to-haves. We handle the rest.

step2.title: Plug Into Your Workflow
step2.description: Integrate with your existing ATS via API or webhooks. No heavy lifting required - just point your candidate pipeline to RoboHire and we take over.

step3.title: Receive Best Matches
step3.description: Our AI screens every application, conducts initial interviews, and ranks candidates by fit. You only spend time with the right people.

step4.title: Get Instant Reports
step4.description: Receive comprehensive evaluation reports via webhook. Know exactly why each candidate is a match - skills assessment, interview analysis, and hiring recommendations.

features.title: Everything You Need to Hire Smarter
features.subtitle: From AI screening to automated interviews, we provide all the tools to transform your hiring process.

aiScreening.title: AI Resume Screening
aiScreening.description: Our AI analyzes every resume against your requirements, identifying must-have skills, experience gaps, and hidden potential.

autoInterviews.title: Automated Interviews
autoInterviews.description: AI conducts initial screening interviews 24/7, asking relevant questions and evaluating responses in real-time.

evalReports.title: Evaluation Reports
evalReports.description: Get comprehensive reports with skill assessments, interview analysis, strengths, weaknesses, and hiring recommendations.

timeSavings.title: 90% Time Savings
timeSavings.description: Stop spending hours reviewing mismatched candidates. Focus your time only on the best fits for your team.

apiAccess.title: Developer API
apiAccess.description: Full REST API access for parsing, matching, and evaluation. Integrate AI hiring capabilities into your existing systems.

webhooks.title: Webhook Delivery
webhooks.description: Receive shortlisted candidates and evaluation reports automatically via webhooks. Seamless integration with your workflow.

multilingual.title: Multilingual Support
multilingual.description: Support for 7 languages including English, Chinese, Japanese, Spanish, French, Portuguese, and German.

cheatingDetection.title: Cheating Detection
cheatingDetection.description: Advanced AI analysis to detect AI-assisted answers, ensuring you evaluate genuine candidate capabilities.

cta.title: Ready to Hire Smarter?
cta.subtitle: Join hundreds of companies using AI to find elite candidates faster. Start your free trial today - no credit card required.

footer.tagline: AI-powered hiring platform that helps you find and hire elite candidates before others.

hiring.welcome:
Welcome! I'm your AI hiring assistant. Tell me about the role you're hiring for, and I'll help you find the perfect candidates.

You can describe your ideal candidate, paste a job description, or upload a JD file. What are you looking for?
hiring.gotIt: Great! I've captured your requirements. Let me summarize what I understand:
hiring.confirm:
Does this look correct? You can:
- Type 'yes' to start hiring
- Add more details
- Upload a full JD for more context
hiring.moreInfo: That's a good start! Can you tell me more about:
hiring.orUpload: Or you can upload a job description file for more detailed matching.
hiring.loginRequired: To create your hiring request and start receiving candidates, you'll need to sign in first.
hiring.loginPrompt: Click the button below to sign in or create an account. Your hiring requirements will be saved.
hiring.updated: Got it! I've updated your requirements. Ready to start hiring? Type 'yes' to proceed, or continue adding details.
hiring.jdParsed: I've analyzed your job description. Here's what I found:
hiring.jdConfirm: Would you like to proceed with these requirements, or would you like to add any specific criteria?
hiring.confirmSubtitle: Review and edit the position title before creating the request.
hiring.titleError: We couldn't generate a title. Please edit it manually.
hiring.jdError: We couldn't generate a job description. Please edit it manually.
hiring.success: Your hiring request has been created! ðŸŽ‰
hiring.step1: Our AI will start screening incoming candidates
hiring.step2: Matched candidates will be interviewed automatically
hiring.step3: You'll receive evaluation reports for top matches
hiring.visitDashboard: Visit your dashboard to track progress and manage candidates.
hiring.chatError: Sorry, I ran into an issue while processing that. Please try again.
hiring.error: There was an issue creating your request:
hiring.tryAgain: Please try again or contact support if the issue persists.
hiring.signInToSave: Sign in to save your hiring request and start receiving candidates.
hiring.helperText: Press Enter to send, Shift+Enter for new line. Upload a JD file for more detailed matching.
hiring.inputHelperText: Press Enter to send, Shift+Enter for new line. Upload JD files for faster setup.
hiring.heroSubtitle: Tell us who you're looking for. Our AI will help you find, screen, and evaluate candidates automatically.
hiring.templatesSubtitle: Start with a pre-built template or describe your own requirements

step1.title: Describe your role
step1.desc: Tell us about the skills, experience, and qualities you're looking for.

step2.title: AI screens candidates
step2.desc: Our AI reviews resumes, conducts initial interviews, and evaluates fit.

step3.title: Review top matches
step3.desc: Get detailed reports on your best candidates and make faster hiring decisions.

hiring.ctaSubtitle: Join thousands of companies using AI to hire faster and smarter.
hiring.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this chat?
hiring.tryDifferentSearch: Try a different search term or category

aiSoftwareEngineer.title: AI Software Engineer
aiSoftwareEngineer.description: Build AI products end-to-end with modern ML stacks
aiSoftwareEngineer.requirements:
We are hiring an AI Software Engineer to build AI-powered products end-to-end.

**Responsibilities:**
- Build AI features from prototype to production
- Integrate model APIs, vector search, and data pipelines
- Design scalable inference services and monitoring
- Collaborate with product to define AI user experiences

**Requirements:**
- 4+ years of software engineering experience
- Strong Python/TypeScript and backend skills
- Experience with LLM APIs or ML frameworks
- Familiarity with vector databases and RAG patterns
- Solid knowledge of cloud services and observability

**Nice to have:**
- Experience with model fine-tuning or evaluation
- MLOps or ML platform experience
- Background in NLP

aiLlmEngineer.title: AI LLM Engineer
aiLlmEngineer.description: Own LLM pipelines, evaluation, and model performance
aiLlmEngineer.requirements:
We are looking for an AI LLM Engineer to own our LLM stack and evaluation.

**Responsibilities:**
- Build prompt and retrieval pipelines for LLM applications
- Optimize latency, cost, and quality of model outputs
- Implement evaluation frameworks and guardrails
- Work with data to improve model performance

**Requirements:**
- 3+ years in ML/AI engineering
- Deep experience with LLMs, RAG, and embeddings
- Proficiency in Python and modern ML tooling
- Experience with vector stores and evaluation metrics
- Strong understanding of prompt design and safety

**Nice to have:**
- Fine-tuning experience with OpenAI/Anthropic/OSS models
- Experience with LangChain or LlamaIndex
- Research background in NLP

fullStackEngineer.title: Full Stack Engineer
fullStackEngineer.description: Ship features across frontend, backend, and data
fullStackEngineer.requirements:
We are hiring a Full Stack Engineer to ship features across frontend and backend.

**Responsibilities:**
- Build and maintain web apps and APIs
- Own features from UI to database
- Collaborate with design and product to deliver polished UX
- Improve performance, reliability, and testing

**Requirements:**
- 4+ years of full stack development
- Strong React and TypeScript skills
- Experience building REST APIs (Node, Python, or Go)
- Proficient with SQL databases and ORM
- Familiarity with cloud deployment and CI/CD

**Nice to have:**
- Experience with Next.js
- Observability/monitoring experience
- Prior startup experience

seniorSoftwareEngineer.title: Senior Software Engineer
seniorSoftwareEngineer.description: Build scalable systems and mentor junior developers
seniorSoftwareEngineer.requirements:
We are looking for a Senior Software Engineer to join our team.

**Responsibilities:**
- Design and implement scalable backend services
- Lead technical discussions and code reviews
- Mentor junior developers and contribute to engineering culture
- Collaborate with product and design teams

**Requirements:**
- 5+ years of software development experience
- Strong proficiency in one or more programming languages (Python, Java, TypeScript, Go)
- Experience with cloud services (AWS, GCP, or Azure)
- Experience with databases (SQL and NoSQL)
- Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail

**Nice to have:**
- Experience with microservices architecture
- Familiarity with containerization (Docker, Kubernetes)
- Open source contributions

frontendDeveloper.title: Frontend Developer
frontendDeveloper.description: Create beautiful and performant user interfaces
frontendDeveloper.requirements:
We are hiring a Frontend Developer to build exceptional user experiences.

**Responsibilities:**
- Develop responsive web applications using React/Vue
- Implement pixel-perfect designs from Figma
- Optimize application performance
- Write clean, maintainable code with tests

**Requirements:**
- 3+ years of frontend development experience
- Expert knowledge of React or Vue.js
- Strong CSS skills (Tailwind, styled-components)
- Experience with TypeScript
- Understanding of web performance optimization

**Nice to have:**
- Experience with Next.js or Nuxt.js
- Mobile development experience (React Native)
- UI/UX design sensibility

devopsEngineer.title: DevOps Engineer
devopsEngineer.description: Build and maintain robust CI/CD pipelines
devopsEngineer.requirements:
We need a DevOps Engineer to improve our infrastructure and deployment processes.

**Responsibilities:**
- Design and maintain CI/CD pipelines
- Manage cloud infrastructure (AWS/GCP)
- Implement monitoring and alerting systems
- Ensure security best practices

**Requirements:**
- 4+ years of DevOps/SRE experience
- Strong knowledge of AWS or GCP
- Experience with Kubernetes and Docker
- Proficiency in infrastructure as code (Terraform, CloudFormation)
- Scripting skills (Python, Bash)

**Nice to have:**
- Security certifications
- Experience with GitOps
- On-call rotation experience

dataScientist.title: Data Scientist
dataScientist.description: Turn data into actionable insights and ML models
dataScientist.requirements:
We are looking for a Data Scientist to help us leverage our data.

**Responsibilities:**
- Build and deploy machine learning models
- Analyze large datasets to extract insights
- Collaborate with product teams on data-driven features
- Create dashboards and visualizations

**Requirements:**
- 3+ years of data science experience
- Strong Python skills (pandas, scikit-learn, TensorFlow/PyTorch)
- Experience with SQL and data warehouses
- Statistics and machine learning fundamentals
- Excellent communication skills

**Nice to have:**
- Experience with NLP or computer vision
- MLOps experience
- PhD in a quantitative field

productManager.title: Product Manager
productManager.description: Define product strategy and drive execution
productManager.requirements:
We need a Product Manager to lead our product development.

**Responsibilities:**
- Define product roadmap and strategy
- Gather and prioritize requirements
- Work closely with engineering and design
- Analyze metrics and drive product decisions

**Requirements:**
- 4+ years of product management experience
- Experience with agile methodologies
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
- Excellent communication and stakeholder management
- Technical background is a plus

**Nice to have:**
- Experience in B2B SaaS
- SQL and data analysis skills
- MBA or relevant degree

scrumMaster.title: Scrum Master
scrumMaster.description: Facilitate agile processes and team efficiency
scrumMaster.requirements:
We are hiring a Scrum Master to help our teams deliver effectively.

**Responsibilities:**
- Facilitate sprint ceremonies
- Remove impediments and coach the team
- Track and improve team metrics
- Foster continuous improvement

**Requirements:**
- 3+ years as a Scrum Master
- Certified Scrum Master (CSM) or equivalent
- Experience with multiple agile frameworks
- Strong facilitation skills
- Experience with Jira or similar tools

**Nice to have:**
- Technical background
- SAFe certification
- Coaching certification

uxDesigner.title: UX Designer
uxDesigner.description: Create intuitive and delightful user experiences
uxDesigner.requirements:
We need a UX Designer to shape our product experience.

**Responsibilities:**
- Conduct user research and usability testing
- Create wireframes, prototypes, and user flows
- Collaborate with product and engineering teams
- Maintain and evolve design system

**Requirements:**
- 3+ years of UX design experience
- Proficiency in Figma
- Strong portfolio demonstrating UX process
- Experience with user research methodologies
- Understanding of accessibility standards

**Nice to have:**
- UI design skills
- Motion design experience
- Experience with design systems

uiDesigner.title: UI Designer
uiDesigner.description: Craft beautiful visual designs and interfaces
uiDesigner.requirements:
We are looking for a UI Designer to create stunning interfaces.

**Responsibilities:**
- Design beautiful, pixel-perfect interfaces
- Create and maintain design system components
- Work with developers on implementation
- Create marketing and brand materials

**Requirements:**
- 2+ years of UI design experience
- Expert-level Figma skills
- Strong visual design portfolio
- Understanding of design principles and typography
- Basic understanding of HTML/CSS

**Nice to have:**
- Animation and motion design skills
- Illustration abilities
- Brand design experience

accountExecutive.title: Account Executive
accountExecutive.description: Close deals and grow enterprise accounts
accountExecutive.requirements:
We need an Account Executive to drive revenue growth.

**Responsibilities:**
- Manage full sales cycle from prospecting to close
- Build relationships with enterprise clients
- Meet and exceed quarterly quotas
- Collaborate with SDRs and customer success

**Requirements:**
- 3+ years of B2B SaaS sales experience
- Track record of meeting/exceeding quota
- Experience with enterprise sales cycles
- Excellent presentation and negotiation skills
- CRM proficiency (Salesforce)

**Nice to have:**
- Experience selling to HR/recruiting teams
- Technical background
- Existing network in target industry

salesEngineer.title: Sales Engineer
salesEngineer.requirements:
We are hiring a Sales Engineer to support our sales team.

**Responsibilities:**
- Lead technical demonstrations and POCs
- Answer technical questions during sales process
- Create technical documentation and proposals
- Work with product on customer feedback

**Requirements:**
- 4+ years of sales engineering or solutions architect experience
- Strong technical background (software development)
- Excellent presentation and communication skills
- Ability to understand and explain complex technical concepts
- Experience with APIs and integrations

**Nice to have:**
- Previous software development experience
- Industry certifications
- Experience in recruiting/HR tech

marketingManager.title: Marketing Manager
marketingManager.description: Lead marketing campaigns and brand strategy
marketingManager.requirements:
We need a Marketing Manager to grow our brand presence.

**Responsibilities:**
- Plan and execute marketing campaigns
- Manage marketing budget and ROI
- Lead content and brand strategy
- Analyze marketing metrics and optimize

**Requirements:**
- 4+ years of marketing experience
- Experience with B2B SaaS marketing
- Strong analytical skills
- Excellent writing and communication
- Experience with marketing tools (HubSpot, Google Analytics)

**Nice to have:**
- Product marketing experience
- Demand generation expertise
- Team management experience

contentWriter.title: Content Writer
contentWriter.requirements:
We are looking for a Content Writer to tell our story.

**Responsibilities:**
- Write blog posts, case studies, and whitepapers
- Create website and product copy
- Develop email marketing content
- SEO optimization

**Requirements:**
- 2+ years of content writing experience
- Excellent writing and editing skills
- Understanding of SEO best practices
- Experience with B2B/SaaS content
- Ability to explain technical concepts clearly

**Nice to have:**
- Portfolio of published work
- Experience with content management systems
- Video script writing experience

operationsManager.title: Operations Manager
operationsManager.description: Streamline processes and scale the business
operationsManager.requirements:
We need an Operations Manager to optimize our processes.

**Responsibilities:**
- Design and implement operational processes
- Manage vendor relationships
- Track and report on operational metrics
- Drive efficiency improvements

**Requirements:**
- 5+ years of operations experience
- Strong project management skills
- Experience with process optimization
- Excellent analytical abilities
- Experience with operational tools

**Nice to have:**
- Six Sigma or Lean certification
- Experience in tech/SaaS companies
- Team management experience

financialAnalyst.title: Financial Analyst
financialAnalyst.requirements:
We are hiring a Financial Analyst to support our finance team.

**Responsibilities:**
- Build financial models and forecasts
- Prepare monthly financial reports
- Analyze business performance
- Support budgeting process

**Requirements:**
- 3+ years of FP&A experience
- Advanced Excel skills
- Experience with financial modeling
- Understanding of SaaS metrics
- Strong attention to detail

**Nice to have:**
- CPA or CFA
- Experience with NetSuite or similar
- SQL skills

hrManager.title: HR Manager
hrManager.description: Build culture and support our people
hrManager.requirements:
We need an HR Manager to lead our people operations.

**Responsibilities:**
- Manage full employee lifecycle
- Develop HR policies and programs
- Handle employee relations
- Lead compensation and benefits

**Requirements:**
- 4+ years of HR experience
- Knowledge of employment laws
- Experience with HRIS systems
- Strong interpersonal skills
- Experience in tech companies preferred

**Nice to have:**
- PHR or SHRM certification
- Experience building HR from scratch
- International HR experience

technicalRecruiter.title: Technical Recruiter
technicalRecruiter.description: Find and attract top engineering talent
technicalRecruiter.requirements:
We are looking for a Technical Recruiter to grow our team.

**Responsibilities:**
- Full-cycle recruiting for engineering roles
- Source and engage passive candidates
- Partner with hiring managers
- Improve recruiting processes

**Requirements:**
- 3+ years of technical recruiting experience
- Strong sourcing skills
- Experience with ATS systems
- Understanding of technical roles and skills
- Excellent communication skills

**Nice to have:**
- In-house tech company experience
- Employer branding experience
- Diversity recruiting expertise

hero.headline: Build AI-powered hiring in minutes
hero.subheadline: Integrate intelligent resume matching, interview evaluation, and candidate screening into your application with just a few lines of code.

what.title: Powerful AI recruitment APIs
what.description: RoboHire provides a complete suite of AI-powered recruitment tools. Match resumes to job descriptions, parse documents, evaluate interviews, and automate candidate communication - all through simple REST API endpoints.

apikey.title: Get your API key

develop.title: Start building

features.title: Everything you need to automate hiring

matching.title: AI Resume Matching
matching.desc: Match resumes against job descriptions with AI-powered scoring and detailed analysis.

parsing.title: Document Parsing
parsing.desc: Extract structured data from resumes and job descriptions in PDF format.

evaluation.title: Interview Evaluation
evaluation.desc: Analyze interview transcripts with comprehensive scoring and cheating detection.

invitation.title: Candidate Invitations
invitation.desc: Generate professional interview invitation emails automatically.

multilingual.title: Multilingual Support
multilingual.desc: Support for 7 languages including English, Chinese, Japanese, and more.

webhooks.title: Webhook Integration
webhooks.desc: Receive real-time updates via webhooks when candidates are processed.

matchResume.title: Match Resume with JD
matchResume.subtitle: Analyze how well a candidate's resume matches a job description
matchResume.resumePlaceholder:
Paste resume content here...

Example:
John Doe
Senior Software Engineer
john.doe@email.com

EXPERIENCE:
Google (2019-2024) - Senior Software Engineer
- Led team of 5 engineers
- Built React dashboard for 10M+ users

SKILLS: Python, JavaScript, React, Node.js, AWS

EDUCATION:
MIT - BS Computer Science, 2017
matchResume.jdPlaceholder:
Paste job description here...

Example:
Senior Software Engineer at TechCorp
Location: San Francisco, CA

About the role:
We are looking for a Senior Software Engineer to lead our backend team.

Required Qualifications:
- 5+ years of software engineering experience
- Expert-level Python programming
- Strong experience with React

Nice to have:
- AWS or cloud infrastructure experience
- Machine Learning background

Responsibilities:
- Lead technical design decisions
- Mentor junior engineers
matchResume.errorMissing: Please provide both resume and job description
